ygData.subject: Re: Playing a Troll Warrior
ygData.msgSnippet: well I havent played a troll warrior but I am playing a barbarian warrior and I have played a troll SW. bash bash bash. bashin es whad trolls do an they reeeli
ygData.messageBody:
well I havent played a troll warrior but I am playing a barbarian warrior
and I have played a troll SW.

bash bash bash. bashin es whad trolls do an they reeeli gud tu.

I dont know about any warrior quests but check out the SW guildmaster, he
might know.
Go out in the swamp and stay close to the guards in the beginning.
remember that water moccasins are poisenus and kinda annoying, there are
better things to kill. Get the regular newbie mobs like skells and stuff. As
you are a warrior wack white and yellow stuff in the beginning. Just
remember to stay close to the guards.
When you feel a bit more sure about yerself follow the steady stream of
people to the island in the middle of the swamp (its kinda hard to find in
the beginning)

There are plenty of froglocks there to bash. Bet keep in mind that they help
eachother and the situation can easily get outofhand.
there are several different frogloks and some are harder the others. If I
remember it correctly its froglok, froglok fishermen, froglok foragers.

They also have armor sometimes.

At level 7 as sw, prolly level 5 or 6 as warrior you can starta a team and
pull some orcs from the zone just opposite the town.
Sorry I dont remember the name but its realy easy to find.

well thats all I can come up with atm.

well there is guk dungeon too but I dont know if its worth going there when
you start up, there is some realy NASTY stuff inthere and trains can be
painfull at times.

Not a good guide but I hope it will give you some poiters and ideas.

Vashi
